alert.note: Alert for Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 5:41PM MST until January 26 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to 6 inches except up to 9 inches above 8500 feet. * WHERE...Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire traction will be reduced. Extend the distance between your vehicle and the vehicle in front of you. This includes I-25 through Raton Pass. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty north winds will create areas of blowing snow and poor visibility. Visibility will be below 1 mile at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass
